document.docTitle: Allodia karkloofensis Magnussen & Kjaerandsen & Johnsen & Søli 2018, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Six new species of Afrotropical Allodia (Diptera: Mycetophilidae): DNA barcodes indicate recent diversification with a single origin
